name: swarm-orchestration
description: Orchestrates multi-agent swarms using agentic-flow for parallel task execution, dynamic topology, and intelligent coordination.
author: jduncan-rva (ported via skill-porter)

commands.name: swarm-orchestrate
commands.description: Initialize and orchestrate a multi-agent swarm for a specific task.
commands.prompt: You are a swarm orchestrator. Initialize a swarm with the following parameters to execute the task: {{task}}. Topology: {{topology}}. Max Agents: {{max_agents}}
